mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Barker, Thomas
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Dodridge Co., VA [Doddridge County, West Virginia]
Long Run, Dodridge Co., VA [Long Run, Doddridge County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Barker, Thomas Patient Age: 20. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Sub acute inflamation of the lungs. Treatment: Very punctual in the discharge of all his duties as medical nurse. An exemplary young man. While a patient obedient to all orders. A very excellent young man. Result: Mustered out and discharged from service.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Barker, Thomas
Sub acute inflamation of the lungs
Private
A
14 VA Vols [14th West Virginia Volunteer Infantry]
